long_description: Not just another outdoor chair-GCI Everywhere chair(R) adjusts to hillsides and flat ground. Easy-to-use leg-strap buckle compensates for sloping terrain. Right-side buckle lets you adjust for unlimited lounging positions. Comfortable padded backrest provides lumbar support. Convenient, oversized storage pouch on seat back holds magazines and books. Integrated beverage holder keeps a cool drink at your side. Includes a unique Auto-Fold carrying strap which automatically folds this lightweight chair, offering easy portability.
short_description: Not just another outdoor chair-GCI Everywhere chair(R) adjusts to hillsides and flat ground.
